master.csv

0,2,4 1,1,1 1,1,5 1,1,9 1,3,3 2,2,0 2,2,2 2,5,1 2,6,3 2,8,8 2,9,0 3,1,3

test01.csv

0,0,9 0,1,3 0,2,3 0,5,1 1,1,1 1,1,2 1,2,3 2,2,1 2,2,2 3,0,1 3,1,2

main.php

 1 <?php
 2 
 3 $master = fopen('./master.csv', 'r');
 4 $input = fopen('./test01.csv', 'r');
 5 $s1dup = fopen('./step.out', 'w');
 6 $s1uniq = fopen('./step2.out', 'w');
 7 
 8 $prevOffset = 0;
 9 $last;
10 while(($buf = fgets($master)) !== false) {
11   $p = explode(",",trim($buf));
12   echo implode("\t", $p), PHP_EOL;
13   while(($buf2 = fgets($input)) !== false) {
14     $last = null;
15     $q = explode(",", trim($buf2));
16     echo "\t", implode("\t", $q), PHP_EOL;
17     if($p[0] == $q[0] and $p[1] == $q[1] and $p[2] == $q[2]) {
18       echo "match", PHP_EOL;
19       fwrite($s1dup, implode("\t", $q) . PHP_EOL);
20       $prevOffset = ftell($input);
21       $last = 'm';
22       break;
23     } elseif ($p[0] == $q[0] and $p[1] == $q[1] and $p[2] < $q[2]) {
24       echo "break3", PHP_EOL;
25       fwrite($s1uniq, implode("\t", $q) . PHP_EOL);
26       fseek($input, $prevOffset);
27       $last = 'b';
28       break;
29     } elseif ($p[0] == $q[0] and $p[1] < $q[1]) {
30       echo "break2", PHP_EOL;
31       fwrite($s1uniq, implode("\t", $q) . PHP_EOL);
32       fseek($input, $prevOffset);
33       $last = 'b';
34       break;
35     } elseif ($p[0] < $q[0]) {
36       echo "break1", PHP_EOL;
37       fwrite($s1uniq, implode("\t", $q) . PHP_EOL);
38       fseek($input, $prevOffset);
39       $last = 'b';
40       break;
41     }
42     $prevOffset = ftell($input);
43   }
44 
45   if(is_null($last)) {
46     fwrite($s1uniq, implode("\t", $p) . PHP_EOL);
47   }
48 }

The result

$ php main.php 0 2 4 0 0 9 0 1 3 0 2 3 0 5 1 break2 1 1 1 0 5 1 1 1 1 match 1 1 5 1 1 2 1 2 3 break2 1 1 9 1 2 3 break2 1 3 3 1 2 3 2 2 1 break1 2 2 0 2 2 1 break3 2 2 2 2 2 1 2 2 2 match 2 5 1 3 0 1 break1 2 6 3 3 0 1 break1 2 8 8 3 0 1 break1 2 9 0 3 0 1 break1 3 1 3 3 0 1 3 1 2

$ lv step.out 1 1 1 2 2 2

$ lv step2.out 0 5 1 1 2 3 1 2 3 2 2 1 2 2 1 3 0 1 3 0 1 3 0 1 3 0 1 3 1 3
